original_text: Then God opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water. And she went and filled the skin with water and gave the boy a drink.
korean_text: 하나님이 하갈의 눈을 밝히셨으므로 샘물을 보고 가서 가죽부대에 물을 채워다가 그 아이에게 마시게 하였더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님이 그녀의 눈을 뜨게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: and she saw a well of water
and filled the skin with water
and gave the boy a drink
